item.title: Adding R UDF to Texera: The Journey
item.description: Motivation # The R programming language is widely used in many fields, such as bioinformatics, statistical analysis, and social science. Its popularity is driven by its capabilities and the growing demand for data-related work. Given its significance, our goal was to allow users to seamlessly integrate R into Texera workflows. We want to enhance Texera by extending its support to include R code and facilitating the creation of R user-defined functions (UDFs) for both the table and tuple APIs.
